label: uncl3077
comment: Code specifying the medium on which a test was or is to be applied.

values.label: Animal
values.comment: Specifies the medium being tested is an animal.

values.label: Human
values.comment: Specifies the medium being tested is a human.

values.label: Sulphide
values.comment: Specifies that the medium being tested is the sulphide component.

values.label: Aluminate
values.comment: Specifies that the medium being tested is the aluminate component.

values.label: Silicate
values.comment: Specifies that the medium being tested is the silicate component.

values.label: Oxide
values.comment: Specifies that the medium being tested is the oxide component.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code assigned within a code list whose meaning is agreed among partners to be used on an interim basis until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
